alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:18PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sebastian and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated outflow from nearby thunderstorms was advancing east-northeast toward Bonanza, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Greenwood... Barling... Pocola... Hackett... Bonanza... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Jenny Lind... Rock Island... Braden... Rye Hill... Jenson... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 12 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
